short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Grab this browser extension for quick access to Guild and University links from within Google Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We want to help lift your productivity while studying. We've added all the important links we could find into a colourful little box, so you don't need to keep track of them.

Get in touch if you think of any other links we should add in!

**Update**
We've added the ability to choose options to this edition. You can now hide a number of the links to reduce the number shown, and you can add up to 4 custom links (maybe put in links to the lecture recordings of your units).

We've also added a short news feed to keep you up to date with Guild News!
